00024 static int acq200_getImagesDef(
00025     struct Acq32Device* device,
00026     struct Acq32ImagesDef* id
00027     )
00028 {
00029         static struct Acq32ImagesDef _id[] = {
00030                 {"ACQxxx", "00", "DXXXXX", "xxxxxxxxx", "xxxxxxx", "xxxxxx"},
00031                 {"ACQ1xx", "00", "DXXXXX", "xxxxxxxxx", "xxxxxxx", "xxxxxx"},
00032                 {"ACQ2xx", "00", "DXXXXX", "xxxxxxxxx", "xxxxxxx", "xxxxxx"},
00033                 {"WAV232", "32", "D22222", "wavlinux", "wav-lca", "251203"},
00034                 {"ACQ216", "16", "D22222", "arm-linux", "acq-lca", "251203"},
00035                 {"ACQ196", "96", "D22222", "arm-linux", "spartan", "251204"}
00036         };
00037 #define ID_ACQXXX &_id[0]
00038 #define ID_ACQ1xx &_id[1]
00039 #define ID_ACQ2xx &_id[2]
00040 #define ID_WAV232 &_id[3]
00041 #define ID_ACQ216 &_id[4]
00042 #define ID_ACQ196 &_id[5]
00043 
00044         struct Acq32ImagesDef* pid = ID_ACQXXX;
00045         
00046         dbg(1, "Vendor 0x%04x Device 0x%04x SubV 0x%04x SubD 0x%04x",
00047              device->p_pci->vendor,
00048              device->p_pci->device,
00049              device->p_pci->subsystem_vendor,
00050              device->p_pci->subsystem_vendor);
00051 
00052         switch(device->p_pci->vendor){
00053         case PCI_VENDOR_ID_HINT:
00054                 pid = ID_ACQ216;
00055                 break;
00056         case PCI_VENDOR_ID_INTEL:
00057                 switch(device->p_pci->device){
00058                 case 0x318:
00059                 case 0x319:
00060                         pid = ID_ACQ196;
00061                         break;
00062                 }
00063         }
00064 
00065         memcpy( id, pid, sizeof(struct Acq32ImagesDef));
00066         dbg(1, "%s %s %s", id->model, id->channels, id->serialnum );
00067         return 0;  /* OKOKOK */
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 
00072 #ifdef LINUX_NEW_PCI
00073 int acq32_read_proc(
00074     char* buf, char** start, off_t offset,
00075     int len, int* unused1, void* unused2   )
00076 #else
00077     int acq32_read_proc(char *buf, char **start, off_t offset,
00078                         int len, int unused)
00079 #endif
00080 {
00081     int idev;
00082 #define LIMIT (PAGE_SIZE-80) /* don't print any more after this size */
00083 #define PRINTF(fmt, args...) sprintf(buf+len, fmt, ## args)
00084 
00085     len = 0;
00086 
00087     if ( S_acq32.ndevs == 0 ){
00088         len += PRINTF( "acq32: NO DEVICES FOUND\n" );
00089         return len;
00090     }
00091 
00092 #define ACQ32_FORMATT  "%5s %1s %3s %8s %12s %12s %12s %5s %s\n"
00093 #define ACQ32_FORMATD  "%5s %1d %3s %8s %12s %12s %12s %5d %3d\n"
00094 //#define ACQ32_FORMATD  "%d\n%5s\n%3s\n%8s\n%12s\n%12s\n%12s\n%5d\n%3d\n"
00095 
00096     len += PRINTF( ACQ32_FORMATT, 
00097                    "model", "n", "chn", "s/n", "arm-fw", "lca-fw", 
00098                    "cal date", "cycle", "heartbeat" );
00099 
00100     for( idev = 0; idev < S_acq32.ndevs; idev++) {
00101         struct Acq32Device *device = S_acq32.devices[idev];
00102         struct Acq32ImagesDef id = {
00103             "ACQ32", "32", "D22222", "boot66c3", "acq32-lca", "251299"
00104         };
00105         int cycle = -1;
00106         int heartbeat = -1;
00107 
00108         if ( acq32_simulate == 0 ){
00109             memset( &id, 0, sizeof(struct Acq32ImagesDef) );
00110         }else{
00111             id.serialnum[strlen(id.serialnum)-1] += idev;
00112             cycle = idev;
00113             heartbeat = 98+idev;
00114         }
00115 
00116         if ( device->getImagesDef( device, &id ) == 0 ){
00117             cycle = acq32_getCycle( device );
00118             heartbeat = acq32_getHeartbeat( device );
00119         }
00120 
00121         len += PRINTF( ACQ32_FORMATD, 
00122                        id.model,
00123                        idev,
00124                        id.channels,
00125                        id.serialnum,
00126                        id.armfw,
00127                        id.lcafw,
00128                        id.caldate,
00129                        cycle,
00130                        heartbeat );
00131         if ( len > LIMIT ){
00132             break;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     return len;
00137 
00138 #undef ACQ32_FORMAT1
00139 #undef ACQ32_FORMAT2
00140 }
